definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Ruminal microbes play a major role in the degradation of forage cell walls in the rumen.
sentences.chinese: 牧草细胞壁在瘤胃内降解主要是瘤胃微生物起作用。

sentences.english: Cancer is a cellular structure whose cell wall has become impermeable.
sentences.chinese: 癌症就是细胞壁变得难以渗透的细胞结构。

sentences.english: One of the two silicified halves of the cell wall of a diatom.
sentences.chinese: 瓣硅藻的两片硅化的细胞壁之一。

sentences.english: Hormones, especially auxins, are involved in the promotion of elongation.
sentences.chinese: 激素尤其是植物生长素可以促进细胞壁的延伸。

sentences.english: The thickening is usually greatest in the corners of the cells or adjacent to the intercellular spaces.
sentences.chinese: 细胞壁的主要化学成分是纤维素和果胶质。

sentences.english: Calcium pectate has been invoked as a material that binds together the cell walls of plants.
sentences.chinese: 果胶酸钙起着粘结细胞壁物质的作用。

sentences.english: Plant oligosaccharides were enzymatically extracted from wheat cell walls.
sentences.chinese: 应用酶解法从小麦细胞壁中提取出低聚糖。

sentences.english: They rip apart cell walls and leave fragments that are useful sugars.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以撕开细胞壁，留下有用的糖片段。

sentences.english: Szostak's experiments show that cell walls are hardiest at near freezing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 绍斯塔克的实验表明细胞壁在冰点附近最牢固。

sentences.english: The lysis of the cells is the first step to extract nuclear acid.
sentences.chinese: 细胞壁的裂解是提取核酸的第一步。

sentences.english: Cell walls are freely permeable to gases, water, and solutes.
sentences.chinese: 细胞壁可以允许气体，水，还有溶质自由的通过。

sentences.english: The wall in association with the cytoplasmic membrane also delimits the paramural region.
sentences.chinese: 与细胞质模联在一起的细胞壁也划出了壁旁区。

sentences.english: Objective In order to approach the biological characteristics of cell-wall deficient bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨细胞壁缺陷对细菌生物学特性的影响。

sentences.english: It is a matrix of hollow cells; its walls are as thin as paper.
sentences.chinese: 它是由一系列空细胞组成的，细胞壁像纸一样薄。

sentences.english: It is significant to increase the mechanical strength of the bamboo culms.
sentences.chinese: 长细胞的细胞壁结构有利于加强竹秆的机械强度。

sentences.english: Axenic cultures were obtained and cell wall regenerated during subsequent culture.
sentences.chinese: 达到了无菌培养和细胞壁再生。

definition: peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
